00027 #ifndef __CAMERA_H__
00028 #define __CAMERA_H__
00029 
00030 #include "omega/osystem.h"
00031 
00032 namespace omega
00033 {
00034         class RenderTarget;
00035 namespace scene
00036 {
00037         class SceneManager;
00038 
00040         class OUTILS_API Camera
00041         {
00042         public:
00043                 Camera(SceneManager* scene, RenderTarget* target);
00044 
00045                 const AffineTransform3& getViewTransform();
00046                 const AffineTransform3& getProjectionTransform();
00047                 void setProjectionTransform(const AffineTransform3& value);
00048                 void setViewTransform(const AffineTransform3& value);
00049 
00050                 void updateView(const Vector3f& position, const Quaternion& orientation);
00051                 void updateProjection(float fov, float aspect, float nearZ, float farZ);
00052 
00053                 RenderTarget* getRenderTarget();
00054                 SceneManager* getScene();
00055 
00056                 bool getAutoAspect();
00057                 void setAutoAspect(bool value);
00058                 void render();
00059 
00060         private:
00061                 RenderTarget* myRenderTarget;
00062                 SceneManager* myScene;
00063 
00065                 AffineTransform3 myView;
00066                 AffineTransform3 myProjection;
00067 
00069                 Vector3f myPosition;
00071                 Quaternion myOrientation;
00073                 float myFov;
00074                 float myAspect;
00075                 float myNearZ;
00076                 float myFarZ;
00077                 bool myAutoAspect;
00078         };
00079         
00081         inline const AffineTransform3& Camera::getViewTransform() 
00082         { return myView; }
00083 
00085         inline const AffineTransform3& Camera::getProjectionTransform()
00086         { return myProjection; }
00087 
00089         inline void Camera::setProjectionTransform(const AffineTransform3& value)
00090         { myProjection = value; }
00091 
00093         inline void Camera::setViewTransform(const AffineTransform3& value)
00094         { myView = value; }
00095 
00097         inline RenderTarget* Camera::getRenderTarget()
00098         { return myRenderTarget; }
00099 
00101         inline SceneManager* Camera::getScene()
00102         { return myScene; }
00103

00106         { return myAutoAspect; }
